attributes.action: Start Esport events in UK such as: Cs:go, Call of Duty etc.
attributes.additional_details: All the biggest countries have their own Esport scene: Germany, America, Denmark, Russia, Poland and a lot more. What people dont realise is that being a pro gamer is actually a full time job which pays good as well also the ammount of money that would be made if a CS:GO major was based in england would be incredible.
attributes.background: A lot of people like my self get good grades at school but feel more confident playing games. Being a banker or a top class architect is not for everone so why not make people’s dreams come true by starting a Esport scene here in England this would help so much young players to get noticed.
